short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A self-custody wallet for most of the EVM based networks

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Guardian Wallet [Alpha] is a non-custodial wallet that provides a direct connection to Ethereum or Ethereum based networks. It supports OAuth social authentication and OTP based authentication for better onboarding experience. In-built Distributed Key Infrastructure manages and secures the userâ€™s key.
